juzs.text: 15|1|Alipha- lama-ra, egulo hacche ayata mahagrantha o suspasta kura'anera [1].
15|2|Kakhano kakhano kaphirara akankha karabe ye, tara yadi musalima hata [1]
15|3|Taderake charuna, tara khete thakuka [1], bhoga karate thakuka ebam asa taderake mohacchanna rakhuka [2], atahpara acire'i tara janate parabe [3].
15|4|Ara amara ye janapadake'i dhbansa karechi tara jan'ya chila ekati nirdista lipibad'dha kala [1]
15|5|kono jati tara nirdista kalake tbaranbita karate pare na, bilambita'o karate pare na.
15|6|Ara tara bale, ‘he ai byakti, yara prati yikara [1] nayila hayeche! Tumi to niscaya unmada [2].
15|7|‘Tumi satyabadidera antarbhukta haye thakale amadera kache pheresataderake upasthita karacha na kena [1]
15|8|amara pheresataderake yathartha karana chara prerana kari na; ara (pheresatara upasthita hale) takhana tara ara abakasa peta na [1].
15|9|Niscaya amara'i kura'ana nayila karechi ebam amara abasya'i tara sanraksaka [1].
15|10|Ara abasya'i apanara age amara agekara aneka sampradayera kache rasula pathiyechilama.
15|11|Ara tadera kache emana kona rasula aseni yake tara thatta-bidrupa karata na.
15|12|Ebhabe'i amara aparadhidera antare ta sancara kari [1]
15|13|era kura'anera prati imana anabe na, ara abasya'i gata hayeche purbabartidera riti [1].
15|14|Ara yadi amara tadera jan'ya akasera daraja khule de'i atahpara tara tate arohana karate thake
15|15|tabu'o tara balabe, amadera drsti sam'mohita kara hayeche; na, baram amara eka jadugrasta sampradaya.
15|16|Ara abasya'i amara akasera burujasamuha srsti karechi [1] ebam darsakadera jan'ya seguloke susobhita karechi [2]
15|17|ebam pratyeka abhisapta sayatana hate amara seguloke suraksita karechi
15|18|kintu ke'u curi kare [1] sunate ca'ile [2] pradipta sikha [3] tara pascad'dhabana kare.
15|19|Ara yamina, etake amara bistrta karechi, tate parbatamala sthapana karechi; ebam amara tate pratyeka bastu udagata karechi suparimitabhabe [1]
15|20|Ara amara tate jibikara byabastha karechi tomadera jan'ya ebam tomara yadera riyikadata na'o tadera jan'ya'o [1].
15|21|Ara amadera kache'i ache pratyeka bastura bhandara ebam amara ta parijnata parimane'i nayila kare thaki [1].
15|22|Ara amara brsti-garbha bayu patha'i, tarapara akasa hate pani nayila kare ta tomaderake pana karate de'i [1]; athaca tomara nijera ta bhandare jamakari na'o [2].
15|23|Ara amara'i jibana dana kari o mrtyu ghata'i ebam amara'i curanta malikanara adhikari.
15|24|Ara abasya'i amara tomadera madhya theke yara agragami hayeche taderake jani ebam abasya'i jani taderake yara pascate gamanakari [1].
15|25|Ara niscaya apanara raba taderake samabeta karabena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna [1].
15|26|Ara abasya'i amara manusa srsti karechi gandhayukta kadara suska thanathane kalace mati theke [1]
15|27|ara era age amara srsti karechi jinaderake ati usna [1] nirdhuma aguna theke.
15|28|Ara smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba pheresataderake balalena, niscaya ami gandhayukta kadara suska thanathane kalace mati hate manusa srsti karate yacchi
15|29|atahpara yakhana ami take suthama karaba ebam tate amara paksa theke ruha sancara karaba [1] takhana tomara tara prati sijadabanata hayo [2]
15|30|atahpara pheresatagana saba'i ekatre sajada karala
15|31|ibalisa chara, se sajadakaridera antarbhukta hate asbikara karala.
15|32|Allah‌ balalena, ‘he ibalisa! Tomara ki hala ye, tumi sajadakaridera antarbhukta hale na?’
15|33|Se balala, ‘apani gandhayukta kadara suska thanathane kalace mati hate ye manusake srsti karechena ami take sajada karara na'i.’
15|34|Tini balalena, tabe tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o, karana niscaya tumi bitarita
15|35|ara niscaya pratidana dibasa paryanta tomara prati ra'ila la’nata.
15|36|Se balala, he amara raba! Yedina tadera punarut'thana kara habe sedina paryanta amake abakasa dina.
15|37|Tini balalena, niscaya tumi abakasapraptadera ekajana
15|38|sunirdista samaya asara dina paryanta.

15|39|Se balala, ‘he amara raba! Apani ye amake bipathagami karalena se jan'ya abasya'i ami yamine manusera kache papakajake sobhana kare tulaba ebam abasya'i ami tadera saba'ike bipathagami karaba [1]
15|40|tabe tadera madhye apanara ekanta bandagana chara [1].
15|41|Allah‌ balalena, eta'i amara kache paumchara sarala patha.
15|42|Bibhrantadera madhye ye tomara anusarana karabe se chara amara bandadera upara tomara kona'i ksamata thakabe na [1]
15|43|ara niscaya jahannama tadera sabara'i pratisruta sthana
15|44|‘setara satati daraja ache [1], pratyeka daraja diye prabesa karara jan'ya (sayatanera anusaridera) nirdista ansa rayeche [2].’
15|45|Niscaya muttakira thakabe jannate o prasrabanasamuhera madhye.
15|46|Taderake bala habe, ‘tomara santite nirapattara sathe ete prabesa kara [1].’
15|47|Ara amara tadera antara hate bidbesa dura karaba [1]; tara bha'iyera mata paraspara mukhomukhi haye asane abasthana karabe [2]
15|48|sekhane taderake abasada sparsa karabe na ebam tara sekhana theke bahiskrta'o habe na [1].
15|49|Amara bandaderake janiye dina ye, niscaya ami'i parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
15|50|ara niscaya amara sasti'i yantranadayaka sasti
15|51|ara taderake baluna, ibarahimera atithidera katha
15|52|yakhana tara tara kache upasthita haye balala, ‘salama’, takhana tini balalena, niscaya amara tomadera byapare sankita.
15|53|Tara balala, ‘bhaya karabena na, amara apanake eka jnani putrera susambada dicchi [1].’
15|54|Tini balalena, ‘tomara ki amake susambada diccha ami brd'dha ha'oya sattbe'o? Tomara kisera susambada diccha [1]?’
15|55|Tara balala, ‘amara satya susambada dicchi; kaje'i apani hatasa habena na.’
15|56|Tini balalena, ‘yara pathabhrasta tara chara ara ke tara rabera anugraha theke hatasa haya?’
15|57|Tini balalena, ‘he prerita (pheresata) gana! Tomadera ara bisesa ki uddesya ache?’
15|58|Tara balala, ‘niscaya amaderake eka aparadhi sampradayera kache pathano hayeche
15|59|tabe lutera paribarera birud'dhe naya [1], amara to abasya'i tadera saba'ike raksa karaba
15|60|kintu tamra strike naya; amara sthira karechi ye, niscaya se pichane abasthanakaridera'i antarbhukta.’
15|61|Atahpara pheresatagana yakhana luta paribarera kache asala
15|62|takhana luta balalena, ‘tomara to aparicita loka’.
15|63|Tara balala, ‘na, tara ye bisaye sandigdha chila amara apanara kache ta’i niye esechi
15|64|ara amara apanara kache satya sambada niye esechi ebam abasya'i amara satyabadi

15|65|kaje'i apani ratera kono eka samaye apanara paribarabargake niye beriye paruna ebam apani tadera pichane caluna [1]. Ara tomadera madhye ke'u yena pichane na takaya [2]; tomaderake yekhane yete bala hayeche tomara sekhane cale ya'o [3].’
15|66|Ara amara take e bisaye phayasala janiye dilama ye, niscaya taderake bhore samule binasa kara habe.
15|67|Ara nagarabasi ullasita haye upasthita hala.
15|68|Tini balalena, niscaya era amara atithi; kaje'i tomara amake be'iyayata karo na.
15|69|Ara tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amake heya karo na.’
15|70|Tara balala, amara ki duniyasud'dha lokake asraya dite tomake nisedha karini
15|71|luta balalena, ekanta'i yadi tomara kichu karate ca'o tabe amara e kan'yara rayeche [1].
15|72|Apanara jibana [1], niscaya tara tadera nesaya bibhranta haye ghurachila.
15|73|Atahpara suryodayera samaya prakanda citkara taderake pakara'o karala
15|74|tate amara janapadake ultiye upara-nica kare dilama ebam tadera upara poramatira pathara-kankara barsana karalama.
15|75|Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche paryabeksana-saktisampanna byaktidera jan'ya.
15|76|Ara niscaya ta loka calacalera pathera pase'i bidyamana [1].
15|77|Niscaya ete muminadera jan'ya rayeche nidarsana.
15|78|Ara ‘a'ika’basira [1]o to chilo simalanghanakari
15|79|atahpara amara tadera theke pratisodha nilama, ara e janapada du’ti'i prakasya pathera pase abasthita.
15|80|Ara abasya'i hijarabasira [1] rasulera prati mithya aropa karechila
15|81|amara taderake amadera nidarsana diyechilama, kintu tara ta upeksa karechila.
15|82|Ara tara pahara kete ghara nirmana karato nirapade.
15|83|Atahpara bhore bikata citkara taderake pakara'o karala.
15|84|Kaje'i tara ya arjana karata ta tadera kona kaje aseni [1].
15|85|Ara asamana, yamina o tadera majhe abasthita kono kichu'i yatharthata chara srsti karini [1] ebam niscaya kiyamata asabe'i. Kaje'i apani parama saujan'yera sathe oderake ksama karuna [2].
15|86|Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i mahasrasta, mahajnani [1].
15|87|Ara amara to apanake diyechi punah punah pathita satati ayata o mahana kura'ana [1].

15|88|Amara tadera bibhinna srenike bhoga- bilasera ye upakarana diyechi tara prati apani kakhano apanara ducokha prasarita karabena na [1]. Tadera jan'ya apani duhkha karabena na [2]; apani muminadera jan'ya apanara bahu nata karuna
15|89|ebam baluna, ‘niscaya ami'i prakasya satarkakari.’
15|90|Yebhabe amara nayila karechilama bibhaktakaridera upara [1]
15|91|yara kura'anake bibhinnabhabe bibhakta kareche [1].
15|92|Kaje'i sapatha apanara rabera! Abasya'i amara tadera saba'ike prasna karaba'i
15|93|se bisaye, ya tara amala karata.
15|94|Ata'eba apani ye bisaye adesaprapta hayechena ta prakasye pracara karuna ebam musarikadera theke mukha phiriye nina.
15|95|Niscaya amara bidrupakaridera birud'dhe apanara jan'ya yathesta [1]
15|96|yara allah‌ra sathe an'ya ilaha nirdharana kare. Kaje'i sighra'i tara janate parabe.
15|97|Ara abasya'i amara jani, tara ya bale tate apanara antara sankucita haya
15|98|kaje'i apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam apani sajadakaridera antarbhukta hona [1]
15|99|Ara apanara mrtyu asa paryanta apani apanara rabera ibadata karuna [1].
16|1|Allah‌ra [1] adesa asabe'i [2]; kaje'i ta [3] taratari pete ceyo na. Tini mahimanbita ebam tara ya sarika kare tini ta theke urdhbe [4].

16|2|Tini tamra bandadera madhye yara prati icche [1] sbiya nirdese ruha [2]- ohisaha phirisata- pathana e bale ye, tomara satarka kara, ‘niscaya ami chara kono satya ilaha ne'i [3]; kaje'i tomara amara byapare taka'oya abalambana kara [4].
16|3|Tini yathayathabhabe [1] asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena; tara ya sarika kare tini tara urdhbe [2].
16|4|Tini sukra hate manusa srsti karechena [1]; athaca dekhuna, se prakasya bitandakari [2]
16|5|ara catuspada jantugulo, tini ta srsti karechena; tomadera jan'ya tate sita nibaraka upakarana o bahu upakara rayeche ebam segulo theke tomara ahara kare thaka [1].
16|6|Ara tomara yakhana godhuli lagne taderake caranabhumi hate ghare niye asa ebam prabhate yakhana taderake caranabhumite niye ya'o takhana tomara tadera saundarya upabhoga kara [1].
16|7|Ara tara tomadera bhara bahana kare niye yaya emana dese yekhane prananta kasta chara tomara pauchate parate na [1]. Tomadera raba to abasya'i dayardra, parama dayalu [2].
16|8|Ara tomadera arohanera jan'ya ebam sobhara jan'ya srsti karechena ghora, khaccara o gadha [1] ebam tini srsti karena emana aneka kichu ya tomara jana na [2].
16|9|Ara sarala patha allah‌ra kache pauchaya [1], kintu pathagulora madhye bamka patha'o ache [2]. Ara tini icche karale tomadera saba'ike'i satpathe paricalita karatena.
16|10|Tini'i akasa theke bari barsana karena. Tate tomadera jan'ya rayeche paniya ebam ta theke janmaya udbhida yate tomara pasu carana kare thaka [1].
16|11|Tini tomadera jan'ya ta [1] dbara janmana sasya, yayatuna, khejura gacha, angura ebam saba rakamera phala. Niscaya ete cintasila sampradayera jan'ya rayeche nidarsana [2].

16|12|Ara tini'i tomadera kalyane niyojita karechena rata, dina [1], surya o camdake ebam naksatraraji'o tamra'i nirdese niyojita. Niscaya ete bodhasakti sampanna sampradayera jan'ya rayeche aneka nidarsana [2].
16|13|Ara tini tomadera jan'ya yamine ya srsti karechena, bicitra ranera kare, niscaya tate se sampradayera jan'ya nidarsana rayeche, yara upadesa grahana kare [1].

16|14|Ara tini'i sagarake niyojita karechena [1] yate tomara ta theke taja (machera) gosata khete para ebam yate ta theke aharana karate para ratnabali ya tomara bhusanarupe pare thaka [2] ebam tomara dekhate pa'o, tara buka cire nauyana calacala kare [3] ebam eta e jan'ye ye, tomara yena tamra anugraha sandhana karate para ebam tomara yena krtajnata prakasa kara

16|15|ara tini yamine sudrrha parbata sthapana karechena, yate yamina tomadera niye hele na yaya [1] ebam sthapana karechena nada-nadi o pathasamuha, yate tomara tomadera gantabyasthale pauchate para [2]
16|16|ebam patha nirdesaka cihnasamuha'o. Ara tara naksatrera sahayye pathanirdesa paya [1].
16|17|Kaje'i yini srsti karena, tini ki tara mata ye srsti kare na? Tabu'o ki tomara siksa grahana karabe na [1]
16|18|ara tomara allah‌ra anugraha ganana karale tara sankhya nirnaya karate parabe na. Niscaya allah‌ ksamaparayana, parama dayalu [1].
16|19|Ara tomara ya gopana rakha ebam ya ghosana kara allah‌ ta janena.
16|20|Ara tara allah‌ chara an'ya yaderake dake tara kichu'i srsti kare na, baram taderake'i srsti kara haya [1].
16|21|Tara nisprana, nirjiba ebam kakhana taderake punarut'thita kara habe se bisaye tadera kono cetana ne'i [1].
16|22|Tomadera ilah eka ilah, kahe'i yara akhirate imana ane na tadera antara asbikarakari [1] ebam tara ahankari [2].
16|23|Nihsandeha ye, allaha janena ya tara gopana kare ebam ya tara ghosana kare. Niscaya tini ahankaridera pachanda karena na.
16|24|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, tomadera raba ki nayila karechena? Takhana tara bale, purbabartidera upakatha! [1]’

16|25|Phale kiyamatera dina tara bahana karabe tadera papera bojha purna matraya ebam tadera'o papera bojha yaderake tara ajnatabasata bibhranta kareche [1]. Dekhuna, tara ya bahana karabe ta kata nikrsta

16|26|abasya'i tadera purbabartigana cakranta karechila; atahpara allah‌ tadera imaratera bhittimule aghata karechilena; phale imaratera chada tadera upara dhbase parala ebam tadera prati sasti asala emanabhabe ye, tara upabdhi karate pareni [1]

16|27|pare kiyamatera dina tini taderake lanchita karabena [1] ebam tini balabena, kothaya amara sesaba sarika [2] yadera sambandhe tomara ghora bitanda karate? Yaderake jnana dana kara hayechila tara balabe [3], aja lanchana o amangala kaphiradera upara

16|28|yadera mrtyu ghataya phirisatagana tara nijedera prati yuluma kara abasthaya; takhana tara atmasamarpana kare balabe, ‘amara kono manda kaja karatama na.‘ [1] Abasya'i hyam, niscaya tomara ya karate se bisaye allah‌ sabisesa abagata.
16|29|Kaje'i tomara darajagulo diye jahanname prabesa kara, tate sthayi haye. Atahpara ahankaridera abasasthala kata nikrsta

16|30|ara yara taka'oya abalambana karechila taderake bala hala, ‘tomadera raba ki nayila karechena?’ Tara balala, ‘mahakalyana [1].’ Yara satkaja kare tadera jan'ya ache e duniyaya mangala ebam akhiratera abasa aro utkrsta. Ara muttakidera abasasthala kata uttama [2]
16|31|Seta sthayi jannata yate tara prabesa karabe; tara padadese nadi prabahita; tara ya kichu ca'ibe tate tadera jan'ya ta-i thakabe [1]. Ebhabe'i allah‌ puraskrta karena muttakiderake
16|32|phirisatagana [1] yadera mrtyu ghataya uttamabhabe. Phirisatagana balabena, tomadera upara salama! Tomara ya karate tara phale jannate prabesa kara [2].

16|33|Tara to sudhu tadera kache phirisata asara pratiksa kare athaba apanara rabera nirdesa asara. Tadera purbabartira erupa'i karata [1]. Ara allah‌ tadera prati kono yuluma karenani, kintu tara'i nijedera prati yuluma karata.
16|34|Kaje'i tadera upara apatita hayeche tadera manda kajera parinati ebam taderake paribestana kareche ta-i ya niye tara thatta – bidrupa karata.

16|35|Ara yara sirka kareche, tara balala, allah‌ icche karale amara o amadera pitrpurusera tamke chara an'ya kono kichura ibadata karatama na [1]. Ara kono kichu tamke chariye harama'o ghosana karatama na [2]. Tadera purbabartira erupa'i karata. Rasulaganera kartabya ki sudhu suspasta bani pauche deya naya [3]

16|36|ara abasya'i amara pratyeka jatira madhye rasula pathiyechilama e nirdesa diye ye, tomara allah‌ra ibadata kara ebam tagutake barjana kara [1]. Atahpara tadera kichu sankhyakake allah‌ hidayata diyechena, ara tadera kichu sankhyakera upara pathabhranti sabyasta hayechila; kaje'i tomara yamine paribhramana kara atahpara dekhe na'o mithyaropakaridera parinama ki hayeche [2]
16|37|apani tadera hidayatera jan'ya aikantikabhabe agrahi hale'o [1] allah‌ yake bibhranta karena, take hidayata dena na ebam tadera jan'ya kono sahayyakari'o ne'i [2].

16|38|Ara tara drrhatara sathe allah‌ra sapatha kare bale, yara mrtyu haya allah‌ take punarjibita karabena na [1]. Abasya'i hyam, tamra nijera upara krta pratisruti tini satye rupa debena. Kintu besirabhaga manusa'i jane na [2].
16|39|Ye bisaye tara matanaikya karache, ta taderake spastabhabe barnana karara jan'ya ebam kaphiradera janara jan'ya ye, niscaya tara chila mithyabadi [1].
16|40|Amara kono kichura icche karale se bisaye amadera katha to sudhu e'i ye, amara bali, ‘ha'o’; phale ta haye yaya [1].
16|41|Ara yara atyacarita ha'oyara para allah‌ra pathe hijarata [1] kareche [2], amara abasya'i taderake duniyaya uttama abasa deba; ara akhiratera puraskara to abasya'i srestha. Yadi tara janata
16|42|yara dhairya dharana kare o tadera rabera upara nirbhara kare.
16|43|Ara apanara age amara ohisaha kebala purusaderake'i [1] pathiyechilama [2], sutaram tomara jnaniderake [3] jijnesa kara yadi na jana

16|44|spasta pramanadi o granthabalisaha [1]. Ara apanara prati amara kura'ana nayila karechi, yate apani manusake ya tadera prati nayila kara hayeche [2], ta spastabhabe bujhiye dena ebam yate tara cinta kare.

16|45|Yara ku-karmera sarayantra kare tara ki e bisaye nirbhaya hayeche ye, allah‌ taderake bhugarbhe bilina karabena na athaba tadera upara asabe na sasti emanabhabe ye, tara upalabdhi'o karabe na [1]
16|46|athaba calaphera kara abasthaya tini taderake pakara'o karabena na? Atahpara tara ta byartha karate parabe na.
16|47|Athaba taderake tini bhita-santrasta abasthaya pakara'o karabena na? Niscaya tomadera raba ati dayardra, parama dayalu [1].
16|48|Tara ki laksya kare na allah‌ra srsta bastura prati, yara chaya [1] dane o bame dhale pare ekanta anugata haye allah‌ra prati sajadabanata haya
16|49|Ara allah‌ke'i sajada kare ya kichu ache asamanasamuhe o yamine, yata jibajantu ache sesaba ebam phirisatagana'o, tara ahankara kare na.
16|50|Tara bhaya kare tadera uparastha [1] tadera rabake ebam taderake ya adesa kara haya tara ta kare.
16|51|Ara allah‌ balechena, ‘tomara du'i ilah grahana karo na [1]; tini'i to ekamatra ilah [2]. Kaje'i tomara sudhu amake'i bhaya kara.’
16|52|Ara asamanasamuhe o yamine ya kichu ache ta tamra'i ebam sarbaksanika anugatya tamra'i prapya [1]. Tarapara'o ki tomara allah‌ chara an'ya kara'o taka'oya abalambana karabe
16|53|ara tomadera kache ye saba niyamata rayeche ta to allah‌ra'i kacha theke; tarapara yakhana duhkha-dain'ya tomaderake sparsa kare takhana tomara tamke'i byakulabhabe daka [1].
16|54|Tarapara yakhana allah‌ tomadera duhkha-dain'ya duribhuta karena takhana tomadera ekadala tadera rabera sathe sirka kare [1]
16|55|amara taderake ya diyechi ta asbikara karara jan'ya. Kaje'i tomara bhoga kare na'o, acire'i tomara janate parabe.
